attributes.action: Force East European Immigrants now resident in the UK to pay road tax, insurances and MOT's on their vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Taxes for Motorists are getting higher and higher, It is only fair that Immigrant East European now uk resident drivers should have the same provisions as British national motorists, ie. Pay road tax, insurances and have their vehicles maintained to our safety standards. I am sure that all uk motorists have seen foreign registered vehicles on our roads in a dilapidated condition.My neighbour has been driving a van with Polish plates since May 2007.
